short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mobile game and app creator app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*Currently in BETA*

Playir is a mobile app and game creation platform, that allows you to create your own games and apps from pre-made templates.

You can customize your apps using UI, Level, Character, 3D Model and Code design tools.

Then instantly release your projects to play on your mobile or browser, using the Playir mobile app on iOS/Android or a direct link you can post on twitter, or embed in an iframe.

For more information, visit: http://playir.com
